TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ViewDragHelper extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: ViewDragHelper is a utility class for writing custom ViewGroups.

remarks.para: ViewDragHelper is a utility class for writing custom ViewGroups. It offers a number of useful operations and state tracking for allowing a user to drag and reposition views within their parent ViewGroup.

Docs.param: true if state callbacks should be deferred via posted message. Set this to true if you are calling this method from or similar methods invoked as part of layout or drawing.

remarks.para: Move the captured settling view by the appropriate amount for the current time. If continueSettling returns true, the caller should call it again on the next frame to continue.

To be added.
Docs.summary: Check if any of the edges specified were initially touched by the pointer with the specified ID.

remarks.para: Check if any of the edges specified were initially touched by the pointer with the specified ID. If there is no currently active gesture or if there is no pointer with the given ID currently down this method will return false.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsPointerDown(int32 pointerId) cil managed

Docs.param: pointer ID to check; corresponds to IDs provided by MotionEvent
Docs.summary: Check if the given pointer ID represents a pointer that is currently down (to the best of the ViewDragHelper's knowledge).

remarks.para: Check if the given pointer ID represents a pointer that is currently down (to the best of the ViewDragHelper's knowledge).

The state used to report this information is populated by the methods or . If one of these methods has not been called for all relevant MotionEvents to track, the information reported by this method may be stale or incorrect.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual float MinVelocity { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Return the currently configured minimum velocity.

remarks.para:
Get method documentation [Android Documentation]
Return the currently configured minimum velocity. Any flings with a magnitude less than this value in pixels per second. Callback methods accepting a velocity will receive zero as a velocity value if the real detected velocity was below this threshold.

Set method documentation [Android Documentation]
Set the minimum velocity that will be detected as having a magnitude greater than zero in pixels per second. Callback methods accepting a velocity will be clamped appropriately.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ProcessTouchEvent(class Android.Views.MotionEvent ev) cil managed

Docs.param: The touch event received by the parent view
Docs.summary: Process a touch event received by the parent view.

remarks.para: Process a touch event received by the parent view. This method will dispatch callback events as needed before returning. The parent view's onTouchEvent implementation should call this.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetEdgeTrackingEnabled(int32 edgeFlags) cil managed

Docs.param: Combination of edge flags describing the edges to watch
Docs.summary: Enable edge tracking for the selected edges of the parent view.

remarks.para: Enable edge tracking for the selected edges of the parent view. The callback's and methods will only be invoked for edges for which edge tracking has been enabled.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool SettleCapturedViewAt (int finalLeft, int finalTop);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool SettleCapturedViewAt(int32 finalLeft, int32 finalTop) cil managed

Docs.param: Settled left edge position for the captured view
Settled top edge position for the captured view
Docs.summary: Settle the captured view at the given (left, top) position.

remarks.para: Settle the captured view at the given (left, top) position. The appropriate velocity from prior motion will be taken into account. If this method returns true, the caller should invoke on each subsequent frame to continue the motion until it returns false. If this method returns false there is no further work to do to complete the movement.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool ShouldInterceptTouchEvent(class Android.Views.MotionEvent ev) cil managed

Docs.param: MotionEvent provided to onInterceptTouchEvent
Docs.summary: Check if this event as provided to the parent view's onInterceptTouchEvent should cause the parent to intercept the touch event stream.

remarks.para: Check if this event as provided to the parent view's onInterceptTouchEvent should cause the parent to intercept the touch event stream.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool SmoothSlideViewTo (Android.Views.View child, int finalLeft, int finalTop);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool SmoothSlideViewTo(class Android.Views.View child, int32 finalLeft, int32 finalTop) cil managed

Docs.param: Child view to capture and animate
Final left position of child
Final top position of child
Docs.summary: Animate the view child to the given (left, top) position.

remarks.para: Animate the view child to the given (left, top) position. If this method returns true, the caller should invoke on each subsequent frame to continue the motion until it returns false. If this method returns false there is no further work to do to complete the movement.
This operation does not count as a capture event, though will still report the sliding view while the slide is in progress.

Docs.summary: A view is currently being dragged.

remarks.para: A view is currently being dragged. The position is currently changing as a result of user input or simulated user input.

Docs.summary: A view is not currently being dragged or animating as a result of a fling/snap.

remarks.para: A view is not currently being dragged or animating as a result of a fling/snap.

Docs.summary: A view is currently settling into place as a result of a fling or predefined non-interactive motion.

remarks.para: A view is currently settling into place as a result of a fling or predefined non-interactive motion.

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which contains the java.lang.Class JNI value corresponding to this type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control which jclass is provided to methods like .

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which provides the declaring type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control virtual vs. non virtual method dispatch against the underlying JNI object. When this property is equal to the declaring type, then virtual method invocation against the JNI object is performed; otherwise, we assume that the method was overridden by a derived type, and perform non-virtual methdo invocation.

Docs.summary: Retrieve the current drag state of this helper.

remarks.para: Retrieve the current drag state of this helper. This will return one of , or .
